name: Blobtime
description:
Grab an Xbox-compatible controller and Do The Blob.

It started as a test for twin-stick controller handling in Construct3, but it felt so fun to handle I just kept going.

Consider it an unintentional 1-day Game Jam?

Controller required (for now).

Made in (free edition of):

https://www.construct.net/

BG Graphics & Audio from:

https://canarigames.itch.io/canaripack-1bit-topdown | https://canarigames.itch.io/canaripack-8bit-topdown

Everything else: Tal
